headline.main: A Signature ISIS Explosive in Europe

snippet: Triacetone triperoxide, which was used in the Paris attacks in November, has become the Islamic State's explosive of choice in Europe. Specialists in bomb detection explain why....

keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
keywords.name: organizations

lead_paragraph: Triacetone triperoxide, which was used in the Paris attacks in November, has become the Islamic State's explosive of choice in Europe. Specialists in bomb detection explain why.

byline.original: By NEIL COLLIER, MARGARET CHEATHAM WILLIAMS and TAIGE JENSEN

headline.print_headline: Bomb on Bus in Pakistan Leaves 14 Dead
headline.main: Pakistan Bus Bombing Kills at Least 14 in Peshawar

snippet: The bus was carrying government workers to the provincial capital when it exploded. The police said the bomb was concealed in baggage left aboard....
abstract: Officials in Peshawar, Pakistan, say at least 14 people were killed and 53 wounded after bomb detonates on bus carrying government employees.
lead_paragraph: The bus was carrying government workers to the provincial capital when it exploded. The police said the bomb was concealed in baggage left aboard.

headline.print_headline: 3 Americans Are Missing in Baghdad, Embassy Says
headline.main: 3 Americans Are Missing in Baghdad, Embassy Says

snippet: The Americans’ disappearance raised fears that Westerners were again becoming targets for militias and criminal gangs that kidnap foreigners for money or political reasons....
abstract: American Embassy and Iraqi authorities are searching for three American citizens who have gone missing Baghdad, igniting fears that  militias and criminal gangs have resumed targeting Westerners for money or political reasons.
lead_paragraph: The Americans’ disappearance raised fears that Westerners were again becoming targets for militias and criminal gangs that kidnap foreigners for money or political reasons.

headline.print_headline: Judgments Against Iran Are at Heart of a Hearing
headline.main: Supreme Court to Hear Case Involving Judgments Against Iran

snippet: The Supreme Court will consider whether Congress acted constitutionally in passing a 2012 law that helps families of victims of terrorist attacks collect judgments against Iran....
abstract: Supreme Court is set to consider whether Congress acted unconstitutionally by passing law in 2012 that aided families of victims of terrorist attacks collect judgments against Iran; case is being heard just months after nuclear agreement was signed by United States and Iran, and ruling could affect relations between two countries.
lead_paragraph: The Supreme Court will consider whether Congress acted constitutionally in passing a 2012 law that helps families of victims of terrorist attacks collect judgments against Iran.

headline.print_headline: Argentina Detains Terrorism Suspect Wanted in U.S.
headline.main: Argentina Detains Terrorism Suspect Wanted in U.S.

snippet: A Lebanese citizen wanted in the United States for suspected ties to terrorism was detained at Argentina's international airport on Wednesday, state news agency Telam said....
lead_paragraph: A Lebanese citizen wanted in the United States for suspected ties to terrorism was detained at Argentina's international airport on Wednesday, state news agency Telam said.

headline.print_headline: 2 Virginia Men Arrested on Terrorism Charges
headline.main: 2 Virginia Men Arrested on Terrorism Charges

snippet: A Virginia man who was allegedly attempting to travel to Syria to join the Islamic State group and a man accused of helping him have been arrested....
lead_paragraph: A Virginia man who was allegedly attempting to travel to Syria to join the Islamic State group and a man accused of helping him have been arrested.

snippet: The Russian parliament on Friday adopted a set of controversial counter-terrorism amendments which have sparked alarm among rights activists....
lead_paragraph: The Russian parliament on Friday adopted a set of controversial counter-terrorism amendments which have sparked alarm among rights activists.

headline.print_headline: Foo Fighters Sue Insurers Over Terrorism Policy
headline.main: Foo Fighters Sue Insurers Over Terrorism Policy

snippet: The Foo Fighters are suing insurers for failing to reimburse them for European shows they cancelled following the Paris terrorist attacks in November....
lead_paragraph: The Foo Fighters are suing insurers for failing to reimburse them for European shows they cancelled following the Paris terrorist attacks in November.

headline.print_headline: Paris Prosecutor: Suspect Charged With Terrorism Offenses
headline.main: Paris Prosecutor: Suspect Charged With Terrorism Offenses

snippet: Paris authorities filed preliminary terrorism charges Wednesday against a 34-year-old Frenchman for allegedly plotting an imminent attack and operating an explosives arsenal of what prosecutors called "unprecedented scale."...
lead_paragraph: Paris authorities filed preliminary terrorism charges Wednesday against a 34-year-old Frenchman for allegedly plotting an imminent attack and operating an explosives arsenal of what prosecutors called "unprecedented scale."

headline.print_headline: Egypt's Parliament Endorses Controversial Anti-Terrorism Law
headline.main: Egypt's Parliament Endorses Controversial Anti-Terrorism Law

snippet: Egypt's parliament on Sunday overwhelmingly endorsed a controversial anti-terrorism law that sets up special courts and shields its enforcers from legal ramifications....
lead_paragraph: Egypt's parliament on Sunday overwhelmingly endorsed a controversial anti-terrorism law that sets up special courts and shields its enforcers from legal ramifications.
